comments.text:
Created attachment 500753
Right hand border doesn't match

I noticed this on a new profile when the Know Your Rights Notification bar come up.  The right hand border doesn't match the borders used in the rest of the window for content area and toolbars.
comments.author: mozbugz@outlook.com
comments.creator: mozbugz@outlook.com
